title: Hauntings & Halloween Spirits
description:
Joining me tonight is psychic medium Vincent Genna who's here to discuss spirits and why they're so active during Halloween.
Visit Vincent's Website

Do you enjoy paranormal episodes? Follow our new podcast 'Paranormal Fears' on any podcast app or Apple Podcasts.


Subscribe to K-Town's other podcasts in your favorite podcast app!

Seven - Our podcast for the jaded ones that need wicked stories in their lives!


Follow us on Instagram @mysteriousradio
Follow us on TikTok mysteriousradioTikTok
Follow us on Twitter @mysteriousradio
Follow us on Pinterest pinterest.com/mysteriousradio
Like us on Facebook Facebook.com/mysteriousradio
Visit our website: https://www.mysteriousradio.com
